name: Part-time job at the Chameleon
description:
Hello!

This is my game submission for the Spooktober Jam.

The theme of the Jam was "Mask the truth". This made me think of disguises and costuming. I thought of a setting where monsters come to buy disguises to fit in at human parties.

Eventually I drifted a bit from the original idea and the game is not only about disguises, but the shop is still there, as well as the gameplay mechanic.

Enjoy!
